SEARCH
Package domain

Class Site.Builder

java.lang.Object
domain.Site.Builder
Enclosing class:
Site
public static class Site.Builder extends Object
Builder class for constructing Site objects with validation. Implements the Builder pattern to create Site instances with required fields.

    • validateRequiredFields

      private void validateRequiredFields() throws InformationRequiredExceptionSite
      Validates that all required fields are present.
      Throws:
      InformationRequiredExceptionSite - if any required fields are missing, containing a map of missing fields and their requirements
